CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

Don't miss our latest events, updates and workshops at Chalhoub University! 
 <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=9ba328040d&e=0385dbee45> 	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/d668b592-7ceb-7df0-7f13-40a4704363f6.png> 	

Your Learning Guide is here!


We are excited to announce the launch of the Chalhoub University Learning Directory! This comprehensive resource is designed to help you navigate our diverse range of learning and development programmes and solutions.

Explore Now! <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=b193881f9b&e=0385dbee45>  	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/b62e4089-1df3-dcbb-ae7c-1bd3714bdb8d.png> 	

Own your development with Udemy

Explore Now! <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=b193881f9b&e=0385dbee45>  	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/b62e4089-1df3-dcbb-ae7c-1bd3714bdb8d.png> 	

Own your development with Udemy


Meet Rahees Kulathil, who is the Udemy star of this month, having completed over 42 hours of learning on Udemy in October 2024. Join Rahees and others and start learning today. Discover more by clicking the link.

Get Started with Udemy <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=a5bea65ab3&e=0385dbee45>  	
	

Leading Teams - Final Cohort 2024


We kicked off the fifth and final cohort of Leading Teams programme with the module “Leading Self”. The participants went on a journey towards inner mastery to understand their own strengths, values and triggers in order to become more resilient and adaptive leaders.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/8b6df73e-0d8b-daed-2946-b1e0511c256f.jpg> 	
	

Elevating Style: Swarovski’s Masterclasses


To enhance customer experience, we conducted exclusive styling masterclasses in Swarovski stores. Held since October, these pre-opening sessions equip our consultants with the latest styling trends and tips. By showcasing different jewelry styles, the team aims to inspire confidence and elevate customer interactions.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/85b39cb6-143b-f520-5f22-eabd326ed89c.jpeg> 	
	

Empowering Our Leaders

To enhance customer experience, we conducted exclusive styling masterclasses in Swarovski stores. Held since October, these pre-opening sessions equip our consultants with the latest styling trends and tips. By showcasing different jewelry styles, the team aims to inspire confidence and elevate customer interactions.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/85b39cb6-143b-f520-5f22-eabd326ed89c.jpeg> 	
	

Empowering Our Leaders


We welcomed new group of leaders to Servant Leaders Coach programme. The leaders had the chance to really strengthen their coaching muscle and understand what stands in the way of them becoming exceptional servant leaders and coaches. 

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/634d57f0-db82-0b61-6035-cd5b9d97d201.jpg> 	
	

Graduation Ceremony- Qatar Retail Academy​


We proudly hosted the annual graduation ceremony to celebrate the dedication and remarkable achievements of our frontline teams in Qatar. It was a celebration of 62 Consultants who completed the CRVQ programme, 4 Store Leaders who excelled in the L1 CAP programme and earned well-deserved promotions and 3 Retail Managers who completed the L2 CAP programme.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/a37db83c-68e5-a5d6-0872-33ff40064031.jpg> 	
	

A Successful Leadership Exchange

We proudly hosted the annual graduation ceremony to celebrate the dedication and remarkable achievements of our frontline teams in Qatar. It was a celebration of 62 Consultants who completed the CRVQ programme, 4 Store Leaders who excelled in the L1 CAP programme and earned well-deserved promotions and 3 Retail Managers who completed the L2 CAP programme.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/a37db83c-68e5-a5d6-0872-33ff40064031.jpg> 	
	

A Successful Leadership Exchange


We recently hosted a group of 40 women leaders from NEOM as part of their Women in Leadership Programme. They engaged in thought-provoking discussions on leadership, innovation, and future trends, and heard inspiring stories from 3 of our successful women leaders: Elma Merhej, Umnia Ahmad, and Louise Diane.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/8bcb9180-c6dc-231a-e45c-12e409050091.jpg> 	
	

CIBTAC Launch


We proudly welcomed the first group of learners to our CIBTAC Level 2 Award in Facial Skincare! This newly launched, accredited programme is designed to be an immersive journey into the world of professional skincare, combining essential techniques in facial skincare with crucial health and safety practices.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/66c06960-5859-f330-9553-c938474bd5e5.jpg> 	
	

Customer@Heart Workshop

We proudly welcomed the first group of learners to our CIBTAC Level 2 Award in Facial Skincare! This newly launched, accredited programme is designed to be an immersive journey into the world of professional skincare, combining essential techniques in facial skincare with crucial health and safety practices.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/66c06960-5859-f330-9553-c938474bd5e5.jpg> 	
	

Customer@Heart Workshop


We kicked off the month of October with a successful "Customer@Heart" workshop for our UAE Accounting team. This insightful session focused on cultivating the five essential Service Personality Mindsets empowering our teams to drive business success.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/55769c28-98da-3dae-6aa0-71c537b93cb8.jpeg> 	
	

Curated Clienteling Programme


We successfully launched a tailored Clienteling programme for our Premium and Delegation cluster. In collaboration with brand experts, Ludmila and Tebogo, we organised engaging workshops and insightful panel discussions featuring industry leaders like Arbi Triki and Rani Aboulhosn.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/9f241d82-e016-de40-1f64-54c602533c74.jpeg> 	
	

Next Generation of Fashion Leaders


We are excited to welcome 49 dedicated fashion consultants who have joined the second intake of our Beyond Threads curriculum this year. The programme is designed to equip them with the essential tools and knowledge needed to deliver an exceptional in-store fashion styling consultation experience for our customers.

We are excited to welcome 49 dedicated fashion consultants who have joined the second intake of our Beyond Threads curriculum this year. The programme is designed to equip them with the essential tools and knowledge needed to deliver an exceptional in-store fashion styling consultation experience for our customers.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/d06a4f82-109b-2822-97da-f8596fed2bd5.jpeg> 	
	

Technical Upskilling with our Learning Pathways


We are delighted to recognize and celebrate the exceptional dedication of our Learning Pathways’ top learners for Quarter 3!

- Abdelrahman Abusabah (Jordan),
- Ahmed Omar (Egypt),
- Farah Alsabah (Kuwait),
- Jefrey Serrano (Saudi Arabia),
- Kishmish Jalali (United Arab Emirates),
- Maribel Derla (Bahrain),
- Mdanam Khan (Qatar),
- Sandeep Kumar (India)

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/b32f8ace-6e30-dee6-0830-253c287d7c92.jpg> 	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/3e8d5c55-076f-d439-b3b4-7495c0ae4864.jpg> 	

Your Path to Success


This month, we are focusing on the essential competency of "Driving Results". Discover how to set clear and measurable goals, empower your team, track progress, overcome obstacles, and embrace a growth mindset to achieve outstanding results.

Discover Your Potential <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=0956bf0078&e=0385dbee45>  	
	

November 2024 Workshops
